subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text:
* [[擧]] (U+64E7); The bottom part displays as [[手]]. (Original form of 舉)
* [[𦦙]] (U+26999); The bottom part displays as [[丰]].

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: This character is a modified form of [[擧]] derived from historical forms of the character (The component {{l|zh|手}} is written [[File:手-seal.svg|25px]] in {{w|small seal script}}). In {{w|traditional Chinese}} script (Hong Kong and Taiwan), this character 舉 is preferred over [[擧]]. Note that this character is not found in the {{w|Kangxi dictionary}}.
